TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToneGenerator extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This class provides methods to play DTMF tones (ITU-T Recommendation Q.

Docs.param: The streame type used for tone playback (e.g. STREAM_MUSIC).
The volume of the tone, given in percentage of maximum volume (from 0-100).

The tone duration in milliseconds. If the tone is limited in time by definition, the actual duration will be the minimum of durationMs and the defined tone duration. Setting durationMs to -1, is equivalent to calling .
Docs.summary: This method starts the playback of a tone of the specified type.
